settings.floating_quote_statement: The line follows one simple demand. If it doesn't work on the pitch, it doesn’t belong.
settings.floating_story_title: This is soccer's technical alternative to training.
settings.floating_story_content:
We engineered all 3 piece using the same design principles that make Storelli the gold standard in minimalist soccer protection.

✔️ Soccer first design principles
✔️ Seamless warp-knit construction
✔️ Vented sponsor bar and sides
settings.story_content: We know what's required to go hard between the pitch and the gym.

settings.title:
Safety
and
performance
for youth soccer
settings.callout_1_text:
Soccer injuries happen.

As parents, the last thing we want is our kid missing out due to a preventable injury.

That's why we created the BodyShield line: to reduce the risk of injuries, add confidence and improve performance.
settings.floating_quote_statement:
Storelli believes in out-smarting the opponents, not out-muscling.
I'm 128 lbs.
I'm all for that.
settings.floating_story_content:
According to an NCAA study, on average there is 1 injury for every 2 players per season.

On average, an injury causes 3 - 6 games missed, an eternity for any player.
settings.sbs_story_content:
An injured player has lower confidence, is less likely to enjoy the game and perform.

As the Romans used to say: "You need a healthy body to have a healthy mind."
settings.story_content: Try our products with free U.S. shipping and easy returns

settings.title: The pitch is your sanctuary, not a place to sweat injuries.
settings.floating_quote_statement: THE BodyShield makes you feel strong, like you have super-powers... I'M 128 LBS.  I'M ALL FOR THAT.
settings.floating_story_content:
NCAA has reported 1 injury for every 2 players/season and head injury rates comparable to American Football.

Storelli BodyShield is built for the grind and pressure-tested for all conditions.
settings.story_content: Add inner and outer strength to your kid's game.
